name: polymath-website
description: Polymath Services website with contact form

scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.deploy: S3_BUCKET=$(aws ssm get-parameter --name '/s3/website_bucket_name' --query 'Parameter.Value' --output text) && aws s3 sync static/ s3://$S3_BUCKET --delete

author: Polymath Services
